CustomField.description: In approximately 200 words, describe the integrated approach to the selection of glazing systems, including frames, glass, films, and gasses, based upon visual needs, elevation, orientation, heat loss, and solar load.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: In approximately 200 words, describe the integrated approach to the selection of glazing systems, including frames, glass, films, and gasses, based upon visual needs, elevation, orientation, heat loss, and solar load.
CustomField.label: Glazing Systems Narrative
